decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawings: Proposed Layout/ Floor Plans drawing no.LP176A (Rec. 27/2/2024), Section, Elevation and Floor Plans drawing no.LP176B (Rec. 27/2/2024)
REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to reduce the width of the rear extension, in relation to planning permission reference 225230HH dated 06/02/2023 for ' Single storey rear extension to lower ground floor (following demolition of existing rear conservatory and additions), rear roof extension and installation of three roof lights to front roof slope and installation of window to first floor rear elevation'
